name: Time is Money (MrTurtle2005)
description:
STORY

You are a robber, who is robbing a bank. You get out of your escape vehicle with the money and walk into the bank, you are going through time in reverse! You must dodge bullets flying back into the guard's guns and return the money to the vault.

This game was made in a week for the 4th Brackeys Game Jam

To make sure nothing is obstructed please play in full screen.

Note - There is a known bug where after dying you may be moving in bullet time speed this is only a minor bug and should not effect gameplay too much.
